body: 原有的切换按钮  并且在原有的切换按钮上添加工具箱  点击切换折线图没有异常 但是在点击原有的切换柱形图的话就回柱形图的显示超出原有的边界

Please do not register the event listener to `timelinechanged` twice. Or call `myChart.off()` to unregister the event listener if willing to register a new one.
Could we have more info: the executable `option`, the echarts packed by `webpack` to reproduce the issue?

`force layout` calculate the positions automatically. 
If specify `x,y`, probably we should not use force layout.
`itemStyle.color` should not be an array.

```js
splitLine: {

    ...
}
```

@daming-lu  that's it ! the data `name` should be passed into seriesModal.isSelected to get the selected state instead of `idx`. idx is the newIdx of data after piePiece.updateData. Thanks ~

Hi. Not clearing events is by design. It's not a bug.

@xiao11lang Hi, you can try to disable the animation.

![73ff7e4d0d5a0578be7e87b117d5d9b](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40513505/71566773-3901e100-2af5-11ea-8c9a-fd2e18f35d9b.png)
The official document is an array, or what data structure should I use?  thanks
@pissang @100pah Understood, thanks

> @xiao11lang Hi, you can try to disable the animation.

I tried, but it does not work. I tested it, only when the number of nodes exceeds 3000 , the problem will appear
你最后怎么解决的啊？ @xaviertung

> > @xiao11lang Hi, you can try to disable the animation.
> 
> I tried, but it does not work. I tested it, only when the number of nodes exceeds 3000 , the problem will appear

3000? Sounds like `progressiveThreshold` problem

> > > @xiao11lang Hi, you can try to disable the animation.
> > 
> > 
> > I tried, but it does not work. I tested it, only when the number of nodes exceeds 3000 , the problem will appear
> 
> 3000? Sounds like `progressiveThreshold` problem

I didn't set progressiveThreshold, finally I solve this problem by set the value of the large option to true

It's global color palette at the top level of `option`.

You can use a callback function.

The target of `serializable` is:

+ The whole option can be transferred between different platforms.
+ It can be saved and read as a string format in any storage system.

You can see it as a format like `SVG`. `glTF`, `geoJSON`

About the three solutions. 

+ The first one is a string template. It's more familiar by the developers. We introduced rich text instead of HTML for cross-platform. I don't think a DSL will be a problem. Especially when it's not a replacement of callback.

+ The second one pipe is a syntax of the first one.

+ The third one is nota serializable solution on ECharts . It's just a workaround to solve the issue we met now

> 我也是这个问题，问下你解决了没？

没解决，最后自己画了

在最新版4.5.0中，貌似依然没有相关的设置和自适应，个人感觉架构时可以类似zlevel或者z配置一样，对yAxis-name进行分层绘制，从而从层级上与axisLabel相对定位，进而避免与axisLabel重叠；

@chaserstrong 建议你可以通过手动设置 nameGap 解决该问题，因为绘制 yAxis 时，在series的data中最大的value是可以提前知道的，因此 axisLabel 能占用的最大宽度也基本可以确定，该最大宽度加上少许margin 就是 nameGap 的值
